search_queries.description: Papers with 'single cell analysis' in the title.
Papers mentioning 'single-cell RNA sequencing' or 'scRNA-seq' in the abstract, common methodologies for single cell analysis.
Papers related to single cell transcriptomics within genomics.
Papers in quantitative biology that mention 'single-cell' in the abstract and 'analysis' in the title.
Papers with 'single cell' in the title and 'immunophenotyping' in the abstract.
Single cell analysis papers that focus on cytometry.
Papers on mass cytometry or CyTOF, techniques used in single cell analysis.
Works by Sarah Teichmann, a key researcher in the field of single cell analysis.
Papers discussing single cell genome sequencing.
Statistical methods papers discussing cellular heterogeneity, often relevant to single cell analysis.
Single cell studies related to the tumor microenvironment.

search_queries.query: abs:"single cell" AND (abs:"metabolomics" OR abs:"metabolic" OR abs:"metabolism")
search_queries.description: Papers focusing on single cell analysis within the metabolomics/metabolism domain.
Papers discussing biosensors designed for single-cell resolution.
